description: This notification is sent when ICL oper state changes.
Var binding cienaCesIclIndex represents the ICL index.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-ICL-MIB::cienaCesIclStateChange CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-ICL-MIB::cienaCesIclIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-ICL-MIB::cienaCesIclName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-ICL-MIB::cienaCesIclAdminState i 1 CIENA-CES-ICL-MIB::cienaCesIclOperState i 1

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This object specifies the name of the Inter-chassis link (ICL).
variables.name: CIENA-CES-ICL-MIB::cienaCesIclName

description: This object specifies the admin state of the ICL.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-ICL-MIB::cienaCesIclAdminState

description: This object specifies the ICL operational state.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-ICL-MIB::cienaCesIclOperState
